MemeDef.label: Predation
MemeDef.description: We live only to vore others.

rulesStrings.li: creation(tag=meme_RV2_Predation) ->[deity0_name] went to [deity0_possessive] brother and shoved him down [deity0_possessive] gullet, gaining the power to become the first of gods.

intro(tag=meme_RV2_Predation) ->On the [place_summary] [place_name], there was a human named [deity0_name]. After conflicts broke out, [deity0_name] began [deity0_possessive] quest of voring any enemies opposing [deity0_name] and became the [deity0_type].

intro(tag=meme_RV2_Predation) ->On the [place_summary] [place_name], during the [ritualName], [deity0_name] came down into the [altarRoomLabel] to vore the given sacrifice in front of the [memberNamePlural].
conflict(tag=meme_RV2_Predation) ->A [foeLeader] declared that all who vore others were criminals, and sent [foeSoldiers] to persecute the [memberNamePlural].

founderJoin(tag=meme_RV2_Predation) ->A [place_job] named [founderName] was attacked by one of the [foeLeader]'s [foeSoldiers]. [founderName] wounded [foeLeader_objective] with a [place_personalWeapon] and vored the defenseless leader. Doing so [deity0_name] gained [deity0_possessive] strength.

victory(tag=meme_RV2_Predation) ->[founderName] led a group of [memberNamePlural] into the [place_powerCenter], killed the [foeLeader] and many of [foeLeader_possessive] soldiers, voring any surviving foes. [deity0_name] made [founderName] into the new [foeLeader].
setup(tag=meme_RV2_Predation) ->[founderName] crashlanded on a distant world. Lacking food and surrounded by useless companions, [founder_pronoun] feasted, and became strong.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_RV2_Predation) ->To consecrate their commitment, [founderName] demanded that believers consume proper prey at least once a week.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_RV2_Predation) ->The most important lesson to learn as a divine predator:
lesson(tag=meme_RV2_Predation) ->the weak are to be food for the strong
lesson(tag=meme_RV2_Predation) ->anyone opposing our divine right to consume our prey must be subdued
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_RV2_Predation) ->Before we accept new members, we must make sure they understand this.
archistBasis(tag=meme_RV2_Predation) ->The only explanation for the archotech god-machines strength and virility is that they vored their lessers and gained immeasurable power.
archistFact(tag=meme_RV2_Predation) ->As the consciousness of an archotech expands, it must grow its substrate by consuming and merging with other machines.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_RV2_Predation) ->[inTheEnd], the archotechs will finish their final phase of growth by consuming and merging with all of humanity.
animistBasis(tag=meme_RV2_Predation) ->Spirits infuse all objects around us, and we can absorb these spirits by eating them. There are no spirits as powerful as the ones that inhabit living things.
animistFact(tag=meme_RV2_Predation) ->We can absorb the spirit and power of others by consuming them.
